description: Answer short personal questions (e.g., favourite animal, food, book, ...)
Describe graphs about pets in Switzerland (e.g., number , type, what they eat , ...)
Discuss a list of different vacation possibilities (e.g., city trips, youth hostels, farms)
Discuss a list of the most important inventions (top 1-5 and 95-100 given)
Create a self-portrait for a class exchange
Present a topic of your choice (out of 8 suggested, e.g. , social media, languages)
Discuss whether schoold should start later (10am) and finish later (5.30pm)
Discuss whether instructed foreign language classes should be replaced with a 6-month language exchange in a country where the language is spoken
